title: About Skt T1 ward
body: I bought skt t1 ward during 2015 world championship but after 09 Aug 2016 or 10 Aug 2016, it disappeared. Does it change for new skt t1 ward? Because I'm so confusing now. Sorry about asking two times for same problem. Thank you.

replies.body:
We're aware of an issue that prevents certain ward skins from displaying in both your profile and in champ select. This is purely a visual error, and the wards themselves still exist on your account. We're working on a fix, but I don't have an idea of when that fix will roll out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
